MineralSite.name: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Hawk Ridge project in Canada dated July, 2022.pdf

document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Hawk Ridge project in Canada dated July, 2022.pdf
document.description: This technical report provides an updated Mineral Resource Estimate for the Hawk Ridge Nickel-Copper (PGE) Property in Northern Québec, incorporating drill holes and recent metal prices to estimate potential open pit and underground mining options.
